amendment.description: To prohibit the use of certain funds for travel by officers or employees of the Department of Homeland Security until the Under Secretary for Preparedness has implemented the recommendations in the report by the Inspector General of the Department of Homeland Security titled "Progress in Developing the National Asset Database", dated June 2006.

action.text: Amendment SA 4674 proposed by Senator Boxer.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4674 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
